column9:
The positive thing is that the burger is quite big, but otherwise just ordinary. Same thing about the fries: in a country where you can get fantastic-tasting potatoes, they were just ok. 
The staff was friendly and the prices are lower than average.

column7: Average burger in a town of outstanding burgers

column7: Good food but could be a little better
column9:
Classy junk as its served with feeling and generosity . One of The fries ever ! 
Service is okay but lacks enthusiasm .
Ill be back but i might not be a regular

column7: There is a burger for every soul
column9: The best burger in town definitely! With such variety of burgers and fries with sauce yo will not be hungry. However, it is not the fanciest place in the town. Meat is sometimes too dry, but most of the time is really taste. Generous portions!
Not the fanciest place to eat but if you are in the mood for a burger, Viggo's is an above average choice in Lund. Easily accessible, it is next to the train station and popular with the locals.

column7: This place is going down the drain. Avoid

column7: Go here and get a burger!

column7: Good Burger, not cheap, service sufficient, place not very clean
column9: Very good Burger, apparently handmade, good fries and souces, I love the onion one, just beside the Central Train Station. The place is little, not very clean, they do not accept creditcard under 100 sek, oftern they forget to release the receipt.

column7: Best burger in town, by far!!!
